name: Mayumi Pachkoski
what_you_do: Mayumi Pachkoski offers structured coaching programs designed to empower aspiring energy healers to build sustainable practices and overcome industry challenges.
who_you_serve: She serves career changers and aspiring energy healers looking to transition into the holistic wellness industry.
signature_programs: Structured Coaching Program for Energy Healers
current_projects: Coaching program to empower career changers in energy healing.
bio: Over two decades of experience in holistic wellness and business development, scaled her own six-figure holistic salon.
